name: Superior_Attuned_Apocalypse_C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, the accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
